description: This is the notice of a construction bidding project. One of the objectives of this project is building construction. Construction-servies are required for various types of construccion. The objective of this project is to provide construction services for various types of buildings.
full_summary:
====================
### Cancelled Tender - QU22SLML
#### Reference Information

* **Reference Number**: PW-22-01017004
* **Solicitation Number**: QU22SLML
* **Publication Date**: December 13, 2022
* **Tender Closing Date**: March 31, 2026 (14:00:00, Cancelled)

#### Description
The procurement for the solicitation QU22SLML has been cancelled.

#### Related Goods and Services

The associated goods and services included in this cancelled solicitation are:
* **Construction of One and Two Dwelling Buildings**
* **Construction of Multi-Dwelling Buildings**
* **Construction of Warehouses and Industrial Buildings**
* **Construction of Other Buildings**
* **Construction Services, Not Elsewhere Specified**
* **General Heavy Construction**
* **Other Special Trade Construction Work**

#### Buyer Information

The contracting entity responsible for this procurement is:

*  **Defence Construction Canada**
*  **Address**: Constitution Square, 19th Floor, 350 Albert Street, Ottawa, Ontario, K1A 0K3, Canada

#### Contact Information

For any inquires, please contact:
*  **Name**: Mark Smith
*  **Email**: [mark.smith@dcc-cdc.gc.ca](mailto:mark.smith@dcc-cdc.gc.ca)
*  **Phone**: 613-859-0549

#### Notice Information

This notice has been cancelled. Please do not submit any bids. 

#### Miscellaneous

* **Trade Agreements**: The procurement may be subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), the World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA), and the Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA). 
* **Regions of Opportunity**: The procurement may be awarded in Canada, Europe, Mexico, and the United States.

Please note that this entry only contains the essential information about the cancelled tender. The free text from the contractor has been omitted. (408 words)
